Absolutely amazing....from the service to the ambiance to most importantly the food and drinks....here is what needs to be ordered no exceptions:Food:Patatas bravasPimientos de PadronPulpoa a la gallegaTaco Cochinitas de PibilCalamares de Andaluza Drink:Sangria!!!!! The bestFresh apple juice tooDessert:BrownieAll the items above are a must have and anything else is just a plus! This was enough food for two people. ENJOY!
